title: CustomMetric
description: Custom Metric definition that we will associate with a column.

id.description: Unique identifier of this Custom Metric instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this Custom Metric.

columnName.description: Name of the column in a table.

expression.description: SQL expression to compute the Metric. It should return a single numerical value.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.
